thread.title: Happy Hotel Hoppers
thread.title_full: Happy Hotel Hoppers - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: catrinasophia
title: Happy Hotel Hoppers
text: Boutique, clean and great customer service - This hotel is a hidden gem and is much better than some of the bigger hotel brands. Stayed for a birthday celebration for my partner. The suite was prepared beautifully and we were made to feel very welcome. Room was clean and hotel is very sheek. We stay in a lot of hotels and professionalism and friendly staff is a deal breaker for us. Thankfully First Hotel hire the right people and look after its guests very well. Massive thank you to Madaliene and Vanessa.
